result.eng: She slipped while she was going up the stairs.
result.ga: Sciorr sí agus í ag dul suas an staighre
result.orig: Sciorr sí agus í ag dul suas an staighre
result.html: Sciorr sí agus í ag dul suas an staighreShe slipped while she was going up the stairs.
result.ponchtml: Sciorr sí agus í ag dul suas an staiġreShe slipped while she was going up the stairs.

result.eng: I saw her while looking out the window.
result.ga: Chonaic mé í agus mé ag féachaint an fhuinneog amach
result.orig: Chonaic mé í agus mé ag féachaint an fhuinneog amach
result.html: Chonaic mé í agus mé ag féachaint an fhuinneog amachI saw her while looking out the window.
result.ponchtml: Ċonaic mé í agus mé ag féaċaint an ḟuinneog amaċI saw her while looking out the window.

result.eng: The work will be easier after a while.
result.ga: Beidh an obair níos éasca tar éis tamaill
result.orig: Beidh an obair níos éasca tar éis tamaill
result.html: Beidh an obair níos éasca tar éis tamaillThe work will be easier after a while.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ an obair níos éasca tar éis tamaillThe work will be easier after a while.

result.eng: I'll be with you in a while.
result.ga: Beidh mé leat i gceann tamaill
result.orig: Beidh mé leat i gceann tamaill
result.html: Beidh mé leat i gceann tamaillI'll be with you in a while.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ mé leat i gceann tamaillI'll be with you in a while.

result.eng: I got the idea while getting up in the morning.
result.ga: Bhuail an smaoineamh mé ar éirí ar maidin dom
result.orig: Bhuail an smaoineamh mé ar éirí ar maidin dom
result.html: Bhuail an smaoineamh mé ar éirí ar maidin domI got the idea while getting up in the morning.
result.ponchtml: Ḃuail an smaoineaṁ mé ar éirí ar maidin domI got the idea while getting up in the morning.

result.eng: I met him while I was in Galway.
result.ga: Bhuail mé leis agus mé i nGaillimh
result.orig: Bhuail mé leis agus mé i nGaillimh
result.html: Bhuail mé leis agus mé i nGaillimhI met him while I was in Galway.
result.ponchtml: Ḃuail mé leis agus mé i nGailliṁI met him while I was in Galway.

result.eng: I was staying with my brother while I was in Dublin.
result.ga: Bhí mé ag fanacht le mo dheartháir agus mé i mBaile Átha Cliath
result.orig: Bhí mé ag fanacht le mo dheartháir agus mé i mBaile Átha Cliath
result.html: Bhí mé ag fanacht le mo dheartháir agus mé i mBaile Átha CliathI was staying with my brother while I was in Dublin.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí mé ag fanaċt le mo ḋearṫáir agus mé i mBaile Áṫa CliaṫI was staying with my brother while I was in Dublin.

result.eng: She was nice at first but she changed the tune after a while.
result.ga: Bhí sí lách i dtús báire ach d'athraigh sí an port tar éis tamaill
result.orig: Bhí sí lách i dtús báire ach d'athraigh sí an port tar éis tamaill
result.html: Bhí sí lách i dtús báire ach d'athraigh sí an port tar éis tamaillShe was nice at first but she changed the tune after a while.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sí láċ i dtús báire aċ d'aṫraiġ sí an port tar éis tamaillShe was nice at first but she changed the tune after a while.

result.eng: He drowned while swimming in the sea.
result.ga: Bádh é agus é ag snámh san fharraige
result.orig: Bádh é agus é ag snámh san fharraige
result.html: Bádh é agus é ag snámh san fharraigeHe drowned while swimming in the sea.
result.ponchtml: Báḋ é agus é ag snáṁ san ḟarraigeHe drowned while swimming in the sea.

result.eng: I spent a while in their company.
result.ga: Chaith mé tamall ina gcomhluadar
result.orig: Chaith mé tamall ina gcomhluadar
result.html: Chaith mé tamall ina gcomhluadarI spent a while in their company.
result.ponchtml: Ċaiṫ mé tamall ina gcoṁluadarI spent a while in their company.

result.eng: We stayed lying on the beach for a while.
result.ga: D'fhan muid inár luí ar an trá ar feadh píosa
result.orig: D'fhan muid inár luí ar an trá ar feadh píosa
result.html: D'fhan muid inár luí ar an trá ar feadh píosaWe stayed lying on the beach for a while.
result.ponchtml: D'ḟan muid inár luí ar an trá ar feaḋ píosaWe stayed lying on the beach for a while.

result.eng: He stayed a while looking at the old house.
result.ga: D'fhan sé tamall ag breathnú ar an seanteach
result.orig: D'fhan sé tamall ag breathnú ar an seanteach
result.html: D'fhan sé tamall ag breathnú ar an seanteachHe stayed a while looking at the old house.
result.ponchtml: D'ḟan sé tamall ag breaṫnú ar an seanteaċHe stayed a while looking at the old house.

result.eng: Stay for a while!
result.ga: Fan go ceann tamaill
result.orig: Fan go ceann tamaill
result.html: Fan go ceann tamaillStay for a while!
result.ponchtml: Fan go ceann tamaillStay for a while!

result.eng: Do not talk to the driver while the bus is moving.
result.ga: Ná labhair leis an tiománaí agus an bus ag gluaiseacht
result.orig: Ná labhair leis an tiománaí agus an bus ag gluaiseacht
result.html: Ná labhair leis an tiománaí agus an bus ag gluaiseachtDo not talk to the driver while the bus is moving.
result.ponchtml: Ná laḃair leis an tiománaí agus an bus ag gluaiseaċtDo not talk to the driver while the bus is moving.

result.eng: I met a couple of old friends from Baile na hAbhann while I was over there.
result.ga: Chas mé le cúpla seanchara as Baile na hAbhann nuair a bhí mé thall
result.orig: Chas mé le cúpla seanchara as Baile na hAbhann nuair a bhí mé thall
result.html: Chas mé le cúpla seanchara as Baile na hAbhann nuair a bhí mé thallI met a couple of old friends from Baile na hAbhann while I was over there.
result.ponchtml: Ċas mé le cúpla seanċara as Baile na hAḃann nuair a ḃí mé ṫallI met a couple of old friends from Baile na hAbhann while I was over there.

result.eng: Sit down for a while.
result.ga: Suígí síos tamaillín
result.orig: Suígí síos tamaillín
result.html: Suígí síos tamaillínSit down for a while.
result.ponchtml: Suígí síos tamaillínSit down for a while.

result.eng: While I was watching those live pictures [on TV], one thing was bothering me:...
result.ga: Agus mé ag breathnú ar na pictiúirí beo seo bhí rud amháin ag déanamh scime dom
result.orig: Agus mé ag breathnú ar na pictiúirí beo seo bhí rud amháin ag déanamh scime dom
result.html: Agus mé ag breathnú ar na pictiúirí beo seo bhí rud amháin ag déanamh scime domWhile I was watching those live pictures [on TV], one thing was bothering me:...
result.ponchtml: Agus mé ag breaṫnú ar na pictiúirí beo seo ḃí rud aṁáin ag déanaṁ scime domWhile I was watching those live pictures [on TV], one thing was bothering me:...

result.eng: While there were black clouds spewing from the towers in New York...
result.ga: Agus scamaill dubha ag plúchadh amach as na túir i Nua-Eabhrac
result.orig: Agus scamaill dubha ag plúchadh amach as na túir i Nua-Eabhrac
result.html: Agus scamaill dubha ag plúchadh amach as na túir i Nua-EabhracWhile there were black clouds spewing from the towers in New York...
result.ponchtml: Agus scamaill duḃa ag plúċaḋ amaċ as na túir i Nua-EaḃracWhile there were black clouds spewing from the towers in New York...

result.eng: The whole country remained under intensive security for a long while after that.
result.ga: D'fhan an tír go léir faoi dhianslándáil ar feadh tamaill fhada ina dhiaidh sin
result.orig: D'fhan an tír go léir faoi dhianslándáil ar feadh tamaill fhada ina dhiaidh sin
result.html: D'fhan an tír go léir faoi dhianslándáil ar feadh tamaill fhada ina dhiaidh sinThe whole country remained under intensive security for a long while after that.
result.ponchtml: D'ḟan an tír go léir faoi ḋianslándáil ar feaḋ tamaill ḟada ina ḋiaiḋ sinThe whole country remained under intensive security for a long while after that.

result.eng: Milosevic was not solely responsible for every crime against humanity that happened while Yugoslavia was falling apart.
result.ga: Níorbh é Milosevic amháin faoi ndear gach coir in aghaidh na daonnachta a tharla tráth titim as a chéile don Iúgslaiv
result.orig: Níorbh é Milosevic amháin faoi ndear gach coir in aghaidh na daonnachta a tharla tráth titim as a chéile don Iúgslaiv
result.html: Níorbh é Milosevic amháin faoi ndear gach coir in aghaidh na daonnachta a tharla tráth titim as a chéile don IúgslaivMilosevic was not solely responsible for every crime against humanity that happened while Yugoslavia was falling apart.
result.ponchtml: Níorḃ é Milosevic aṁáin faoi ndear gaċ coir in aġaiḋ na daonnaċta a ṫarla tráṫ titim as a ċéile don IúgslaivMilosevic was not solely responsible for every crime against humanity that happened while Yugoslavia was falling apart.

result.eng: A little while after it got dark...
result.ga: Tamall beag i ndiaidh a ghabháil ó sholas dó
result.orig: Tamall beag i ndiaidh a ghabháil ó sholas dó
result.html: Tamall beag i ndiaidh a ghabháil ó sholas dóA little while after it got dark...
result.ponchtml: Tamall beag i ndiaiḋ a ġaḃáil ó ẛolas dóA little while after it got dark...
